1171460.name: Die Young - Official Soundtrack
1171460.description:
The Official Soundtrack for Die Young captures the various atmospheres of the game.
It includes also all the songs used in various trailers and credits.
The soundtrack includes all original tracks composed by Simon Chylinski ( composer of Subnautica OST )
as well as licensed tracks from Gipsy & Cat, Righteous Reprobes, Ultra and Frederic Andre.

The soundtrack includes also a text file that points to all creative commons tracks used in the game.

Track List:

  • A Wrong Choice ( DY Main Theme ) - Simon Chylinski ( 3:25 )
  • Apricot Valley - Simon Chylinski ( 2:19 )
  • Bane Of My Existence ( Main Menu Theme ) - Righteous Reprobates ( 4:26 )
  • Chased - Simon Chylinski ( 1:54 )
  • Cujo - Simon Chylinski ( 0:41 )
  • Fire - Gypsy & The Cat ( 3:28 )
  • Hope - Simon Chylinski ( 2:02 )
  • Ikaria - Simon Chylinski ( 1:53 )
  • Into The Dark - Simon Chylinski ( 3:06 )
  • Lost and stranded - Simon Chylinski ( 3:00 )
  • Monumental Tombs - Simon Chylinski ( 2:59 )
  • Murders - Simon Chylinski ( 1:48 )
  • Pinewood - Simon Chylinski ( 1:41 )
  • Quantum Leap - Simon Chylinski ( 2:50 )
  • Stone Pillars - Simon Chylinski ( 1:33 )
  • Survive ( Instrumental ) - Simon Chylinski ( 2:50 )
  • Survive - Simon Chylinski ( 2:50 )
  • The Beginning - Simon Chylinski ( 2:26 )
  • Turkish Parade - Simon Chylinski ( 0:45 )
  • Twin Houses - Simon Chylinski ( 1:39 )
  • Universe in Two - The Ultra ( 6:07 )
  • Wandering - Simon Chylinski ( 2:46)
  • Where is She Now - Frederic Andre ( 3:32 )
